title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 488.3 - Failure to pay the tax due to fraud
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 488.3 - Failure to pay the tax due to fraud

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 512(1)(d)
(a) In lieu of the penalty described in
section
488.1
and the interest described in section
488.4
of this Part, if the failure to pay any tax on or before the prescribed date
for payment is attributable to fraud, the penalty and interest prescribed in
section
512 (1)(d)
of the Tax Law
shall be added to the tax. (b) The
penalties and interest pursuant to this section are determined, assessed, collected and paid in the same manner as the taxes imposed by article 21 of the

Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
488.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
